description: Extend one of your arms with your palm facing forward and pull your fingers upwards for 10 seconds per hand.
Stretch your arm against your chest and pull it using your other arm for 10 seconds per arm.
Pull your neck with the help of your hand to the right and to the left, remaining in position for a few seconds.
With both hands on the back of the head, bring it down, stretching the back of the area.
Cross your legs and descend with your hands straight towards the floor. Repeat the movement with the other leg in front.
Sitting, open your legs and try to touch your palms to the floor, repeat 3 times for 5 seconds.
Pull your knee against your chest and hold, switch legs after 10 seconds.
Sitting, cross one leg and lean your torso forward, switch legs after 10 seconds.
Sentado, feche os olhos e cubra-os com as palmas da m√£o durante 2 minutos, depois abra normalmente.
Sitting, close your eyes and cover them with your palms for 2 minutes, then open normally.
Using your thumbs, massage the area under the eyebrows in a circular motion for 15 seconds.
Standing, rotate your waist as far as you can to the left, hold for five seconds. Repeat to the right.
